name: VERT
description: VERT is a file conversion utility that uses WebAssembly to convert files on your device instead of a cloud. Convert images, audio, documents, and video with support for over 250+ file formats. No file or file size limits.
longDescription: VERT is a file conversion utility that uses WebAssembly to convert files on your device instead of a cloud. Convert images, audio, documents, and video with support for over 250+ file formats. No file or file size limits.
